name: My Album Gallery
author: Mircode

sections.description:
Live Demo

My Album Gallery can showcase your images in gallery and album view. If you need to manage large number of images whether you are a photographer, event manager, photo lover, artist with portfolio or want product gallery you can do it with this plugin. Album can be divided by category and subcategory. Plugin has built in Single and Archive page template. You can add Album or category in sidebar for easy navigation for large number of image decoration.

Before using My Album Gallery plugin you must read the Documentation or at least watch this Get Started video . If you uploaded images before My Album Gallery plugin installation then you must Regenerate Thumbnails using this plugin.

Features: (Free Version)

  • Multi-image album uploader.
  • Unlimited Album or Gallery. No restriction.
  • Album Category or Sub-Category Navigation
  • Built in Archive and Single page template
  • Built in Sidebar for easy navigation with large number of images
  • Control sidebar from option panel
  • Basic functionality control from option panel
  • Translation Ready to Any Language
  • Easy to use shortcode. Every theme compatible

Ready to use Template: (Free Version)

  • Album Layout – Demo
  • Single Page – Demo
  • Archive/Category Page – Demo
  • Thumbnail (2 Column) – Demo
  • Thumbnail (3 Column) – Demo
  • Thumbnail (4 Column) – Demo
  • Thumbnail (5 Column) – Demo
  • Thumbnail (6 Column) – Demo
  • Thumbnail (3 Column + Gap) – Demo
  • Thumbnail (5 Column + Gap) – Demo
  • Column gap also applicaple for 2, 4, 6 column
  • Masonry (2 Column) – Demo
  • Masonry (3 Column) – Demo
  • Masonry (4 Column) – Demo
  • Masonry (5 Column) – Demo
  • Masonry (6 Column) – Demo
  • Masonry (4 Column+No gap) – Demo
  • Masonry (5 Column+No gap) – Demo
  • Masonry (6 Column+No gap) – Demo
  • Portfolio (2 Column) – Demo
  • Portfolio (3 Column) – Demo
  • Portfolio (4 Column) – Demo

Check the demo site: Date Time Picker Demo
Download Pro Version at only $39:
Must watch Getting Started video before using this plugin:

Features of Album Gallery plugin:

  • Unlimited website usage, Lifetime update
  • Masonry, Thumbnail, Portfolio Gallery
  • Ajax infinite scroll for both gallery and album
  • Google photo like album view with both pagination and infinite scroll
  • Album timeline view
  • Gallery Hover effect
  • Album Hover effect
  • Social integration with share button for facebook, twitter, linkedin, tumblr, pinterest
  • Like, comments, view like facebook both for guest and logged in user.
  • Modal gallery preview with thumbnail image navigation
  • Pop up ajax image view with navigation control
  • 4 way gallery preview. (Thumbnail, Masonry, Right Content, Hover Content)
  • 3 way album decoration. (Basic, Google+ like and Timeline)
  • Powerfull option panel to change color skin and some settings.
  • Album carosel, Gallery carosel
  • Full width Gallery slider
  • WordPress multisite ready

Ready to use Template: (Pro Version)

  • Album Pro – Demo
  • Album Pro – Infinite Scroll – Demo
  • Album Pro – Timeline – Demo
  • Album Pro – Carousel – Demo

  • Thumbnail Infinite Scroll (6 Column) – Demo
  • Thumbnail Infinite Scroll (3 Column + Gap) – Demo

  • Column gap also applicaple for 2, 3, 4 column
  • Masonry (2 Column) – Demo

sections.faq:
Is Pro version is an addon?

No. Pro version is seperate plugin. You need to deactivate free version or free version will automatically deactivated when install Pro version.

How many websites can I use it?

You can use it in unlimited website.

  • Fix option not saving

1.0.3

  • Fix release related issue

1.0.2

  • Fix album related issue

1.0.1

  • Initial Release

short_description: The Ultimate WordPress Album, Photo Gallery Plugin. If you need to manage large number of images this plugin is for you.
